SIRIKANANATHAN – Mrs. SELVANAYAKI (SELVI) (Retired Senior Lecturer in Economics at the University of Colombo). Beloved wife of Saravanapavan Sirikananathan,​ passed away peacefully in Colombo on 8 April 2024. Loving daughter of late Mr and Mrs Sittambalam; daughter-in-law of late Mr and Mrs Saravanapavan; fondly loved mother of late Shivahar and Nishkala (USA); mother-in-law of Wijhehar and grandmother of Vikashni and Nivashni. She was a loving sister of Kanapathipillai (Sittambalam) (UK),​ Sivagnanasundaram (Sydney),​ Balasundaram (Colombo),​ late Dr Rajasundaram,​ Kumarasundaram (USA),​ Sivanayaki (UK) and Sathianayaki (UK) and sister-in-law of Panumathy,​ Bhaskari,​ Parama,​ Maharani,​ Nilamini,​ Sanmugarajah,​ Gangatharan,​ Vimalarajah and Jegatheesan. Remains lie at “The Respect Home” by Jayaratnas’ on Monday,​ 15 April 2024 from 9am for cremation at Borella,​ Kanatte (Hindu Section) at 4pm.
